title: A vindication of the honour of King Charles I against the prodigious calumnies of the regicide, Ludlow, publisht in what he calls A letter from Major-General Ludlow to Sir E.S.
author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.
notes: Attributed to Edmund Elys. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Imperfect: filmed copy dark and partially illegible with print show-through.
